actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to extend penalties for the operation of a locomotive, and to provide increased penalties for the operation of a common carrier, under the influence of alcohol or drugs if such operation results in serious bodily injury or death.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code, with respect to criminal penalties for operating a common carrier under the influence of alcohol or drugs, to: (1) provide criminal penalties for operation of those who operate a locomotive under the influence of alcohol or drugs; and (2) provide increased criminal penalties where a death or serious injury results from such operation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to extend penalties for the operation of a locomotive, and to provide increased penalties for the operation of a common carrier, under the influence of alcohol or drugs if such operation results in serious bodily injury or death.
